# updateProperties()

**Instance Method**

Configures the view’s content and styling properties before layout.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func updateProperties()
```

## Overview

Override this method to configure content and styling in your view subclass. Don’t call this method directly; instead, call [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIView/setNeedsUpdateProperties()] to schedule an update.

This method supports automatic observation tracking. For more information, see [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/updating-views-automatically-with-observation-tracking].

## Observing data in views

- **layoutSubviews()**: Lays out subviews.
- **updateConstraints()**: Updates constraints for the view.
- **draw(_:)**: Draws the view’s image within the passed-in rectangle.
